description:
You asked - and I'm delivering: here's my favorite solo-play miniatures wargames rules!

Rangers of Shadow Deep PDF: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/298580/rangers-of-shadow-deep-pdf
Rangers of Shadow Deep book: https://modiphius.us/collections/rangers-of-shadow-deep/products/rangers-of-shadow-deep-standard-edition
Five Parsecs From Home: https://modiphius.us/collections/five-parsecs-from-home
Five Leagues from the Borderlands: https://modiphius.us/collections/five-leagues-from-the-borderlands
Forbidden Psalm, The Last War, and Kill Sample Process: https://www.forbiddenpsalm.com
The Doomed: https://www.ospreypublishing.com/us/doomed-9781472854254
Snarling Badger Studios games: https://www.snarlingbadger.com

I'm now a partner on Twitch! I paint minis every Friday morning and Monday night, and sometimes take paint breaks (play video games poorly). Follow me: http://www.twitch.tv/tabletopminions

Official Tabletop Minions t-shirts: http://bit.ly/merchbunker

Help support the cha
title: Check Out My FAVORITE Solo-Play Miniatures Wargames
